name: R5-Device-R4B-Device
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Device into FHIR R4B

target.comment: R5 `Device` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device`

element.display: An identifier that supports traceability to the event during which material in this product from one or more biological entities was obtained or pooled
Indicates a high-level grouping of the device
Identifies the standards, specifications, or formal guidances for the capabilities supported by the device
Describes the common type of the standard, specification, or formal guidance.  communication | performance | measurement
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Identifies the standard, specification, or formal guidance that the device adheres to
Specific form or variant of the standard

target.comment: R5 `Device.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.contact`
R5 `Device.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.contained`

element.display: The series of occurrences that repeats during the operation of the device
The reference to the definition for the device

target.display: The reference to the definition for the device
target.comment: R5 `Device.definition` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.definition` - definition has change due to type change: R5 definition CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B definition

element.display: The name used to display by default when the device is referenced
A measurement of time during the device's operation (e.g., days, hours, mins, etc.)
Technical endpoints providing access to electronic services provided by the device
Date and time of expiry of this device (if applicable)

target.display: Date and time of expiry of this device (if applicable)
target.comment: R5 `Device.expirationDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.expirationDate`

R5 `Device.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Linked device acting as a communication/data collector, translator or controller

target.comment: R5 `Device.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.id`
R5 `Device.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Device.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.implicitRules`
R5 `Device.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Device.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `Device.location` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.location`
R5 `Device.lotNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.lotNumber`

element.display: Date when the device was made

target.display: Date when the device was made
target.comment: R5 `Device.manufactureDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.manufactureDate`
R5 `Device.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.manufacturer`
R5 `Device.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.meta`

element.display: The designated condition for performing a task
The manufacturer's model number for the device

target.display: The manufacturer's model number for the device
target.comment: R5 `Device.modelNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.modelNumber`

R5 `Device.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: The name or names of the device as known to the manufacturer and/or patient
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The term that names the device

target.comment: R5 `Device.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `note`
R5 `Device.owner` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.owner`

element.display: The higher level or encompassing device that this device is a logical part of

target.display: The device that this device is attached to or is part of
target.comment: R5 `Device.parent` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.parent`

element.display: The part number or catalog number of the device

target.display: The part number or catalog number of the device
target.comment: R5 `Device.partNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.partNumber`

element.display: Inherent, essentially fixed, characteristics of the device.  e.g., time properties, size, material, etc.

target.display: The actual configuration settings of a device as it actually operates, e.g., regulation status, time properties
target.comment: R5 `Device.property` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.property`

R5 `Device.property.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.property.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Device.property.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.property.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Device.property.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.property.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Code that specifies the property being represented

target.display: Code that specifies the property DeviceDefinitionPropetyCode (Extensible)
target.comment: R5 `Device.property.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Device.property.type` - type removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-property-type
R5 `Device.safety` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Device.safety` - safety removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-safety

element.display: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer

target.display: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer
target.comment: R5 `Device.serialNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.serialNumber`

R5 `Device.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-status|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Device.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.text`

element.display: The kind or type of device

target.display: The kind or type of device
target.comment: R5 `Device.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Device.type` - type changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)
R5 `Device.udiCarrier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.carrierAIDC` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.carrierAIDC`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.carrierHRF` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.carrierHRF`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.deviceIdentifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.deviceIdentifier`

element.display: barcode | rfid | manual | card | self-reported | electronic-transmission | unknown

target.comment: R5 `Device.udiCarrier.entryType` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.entryType` - entryType has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/udi-entry-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/udi-entry-type|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

R5 `Device.udiCarrier.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.id`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.issuer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.issuer`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.jurisdiction`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Device.udiCarrier.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.udiCarrier.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `Device.url` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.url`

element.display: The actual design of the device or software version running on the device

target.display: The actual design of the device or software version running on the device
target.comment: R5 `Device.version` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.version`

element.display: The hardware or software module of the device to which the version applies

target.display: A single component of the device version
target.comment: R5 `Device.version.component` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.version.component`

R5 `Device.version.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.version.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Device.version.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.version.id`

element.display: The date the version was installed on the device
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Device.version.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Device.version.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: The type of the device version, e.g. manufacturer, approved, internal

target.display: The type of the device version, e.g. manufacturer, approved, internal
target.comment: R5 `Device.version.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Device.version.type` - type removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-versiontype
R5 `Device.version.value` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Device.version.value`
